summary: The diff only modifies metadata/state summary files and does not show any change to the actual About Us founder image or the asset at the required path. Therefore REQ-1 is not implemented based on the provided diff evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the About Us page founder image to use the user-provided reference photo, keeping the existing image path `/assets/generated/founder-photo.dim_300x400.jpg` so the Founder's Message section displays the new picture.
missing_requirements.reason: No code or asset changes are shown for the About Us page or the referenced image path; only summary/state files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state updated to include new feature requests AR-1 and AR-2 marked as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asked for implementing REQ-1 in the frontend, not for adding/updating internal project tracking entries.
